snippet: The war of words between Nick Kyrgios and his national Olympic committee has continued, with the Australian tennis player launching a poll on social media as to whether he should be selected for the Rio Olympics....
lead_paragraph: The war of words between Nick Kyrgios and his national Olympic committee has continued, with the Australian tennis player launching a poll on social media as to whether he should be selected for the Rio Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Asks Fans to Judge Olympic Credentials
headline.main: Kyrgios Asks Fans to Judge Olympic Credentials
